short_summary: Software license and support M&S for Enterprise Edition
description: Altova XMLSpy software license, support, and maintenance renewal for Enterprises Edition between March 29, 2024, and March 28, 2025, with observed tender changes and extended deadline. Submission is only possible through the P2P portal, and all bidders must first register through it.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Observations:

*Contracting Authority: Shared Services Canada*
*Tender Title: Altova XMLSpy Software License M&S Renewal - Amendment 1*
*Goods and Services: Software license and support & maintenance for Altova XMLSpy Enterprises Edition*
*(invite)
Publication Date: February 27, 2024
Closes: March 12, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
Amendment 1 - Issued: March 6, 2024

The federal government has released a request for proposal (RFP) for the renewal of Altova XMLSpy software licenses, along with support and maintenance services. The contract's term will run from March 29, 2024, to March 28, 2025.

The required goods and services entailed are best-in-class software licensing, plus maintenance and support agreements for Altova XMLSpy Enterprises Edition. Suppliers are invited to bid through Shared Service Canada’s public procurement portal in order to place their submissions.

Contracting Entity:
Shared Service Canada
Address: 180 Kent Street 
Ottawa, Ontario K1G 4A8
Phone: 613-302-0766
Fax: 613-960-6026

## Solicitation Instructions
1 - Suppliers must register for a Secure login through Shared Service Canada’s public procurement portal before responding to RFP. 
2: Provide scope statement describing the goods and services required under the solicitation.
3: Additional information on RFP submission must be provided.
